zone.line: magnificent fiction with a religious
feeling, it engenders something
worse. But Prometheus is, as
it were, the type of the highest
perfection of moral & intellectual
nature, impelled by the purest
& the truest motives to the best
& noblest ends.
This Poem was chiefly written among upon
the mountainous ruins of the Baths of
Caracalla, among the flowery glades, &
thickets of odor o i ferous blossoming trees

which has are
^ extended stretched out
^ extended in ever winding labyrinths
am upon
its immense platforms & dizzy arches
suspended in the air. The bright blue
air sky of Rome, & the effect of the vigorous
awakening of spring in that divinest
climate, and the new life with which
it drenches the spirits even to intoxi
cation, were the inspiration of this
drama.
employed will be found in many
instances to have been drawn from
